snippet: The Bloomberg administration lost a legal battle to withhold a series of e-mail exchanges in 2010 between Cathleen P. Black and city officials over her appointment as schools chancellor.
lead_paragraph: The Bloomberg administration lost a legal battle to withhold a series of e-mail exchanges in 2010 between Cathleen P. Black and city officials over her appointment as schools chancellor.

headline.main: E-Mails Between Cathleen P. Black and New York Officials
